forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 69. West southwest wind around 22 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Partly cloudy. Low around 40, with temperatures rising to around 44 overnight. West wind 14 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
